thread.title: Dollar Rises as Stocks Continue Selloff

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Rises as Stocks Continue Selloff
text:
The dollar rose Monday, as investors sought shelter amid a selloff in stocks.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently up 0.3% at 83.82.
